participant_1.background:
I've never been in a relationship, but I'm not lonely because of my friends.
I loved spending summers in the mountains, where the weather was always cool and refreshing.
I value my education.
I always end my day with a cup of chai tea to wind down from the chaos of family life.
I'm doing well at school, but I wish I was taller so I could reach the top shelf.

participant_2.background:
I won a golf trophy in a tournament when I was 10 years old.
britney spears is a wonderful singer who really touches me.
i drink a lot of apple martinis when i get a girls night out.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.
I like to drive my car to new places and explore.

content.text: Good morning! I'm getting ready for work now. How are you doing?
I'm good! I'm having a lazy morning before I have to go to work.
Nice! I love lazy mornings. What do you like to do on your lazy mornings?
I like to drink coffee and read the news, or watch a movie or tv show. What do you like to do?
I love to read, too! I also like to play video games or go for walks.
I love video games too! What are your favorite games?
I love the Zelda games, and I also really like the Mario games.
I love the Zelda games too! I've never really played any Mario games, though.
Oh, you should! They're a lot of fun.
I'll have to check them out sometime.
